<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access/> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>pm_project</collection> <condition>current.run_calc_brs != false</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="pm_project">start_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Dates for Project</name> <order>20</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[validateDates();
function validateDates(){
var ptmUtil = new ProjectTaskManagerUtil(); var resp = ptmUtil.validatePlannedDates(current); if( resp && resp.status == 'failure'){ gs.addErrorMessage(resp.message); current.setAbortAction(true); return; } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-07-02 18:10:50</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1d191567d7212100204a0ee60e6103f7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Dates for Project</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1d191567d7212100204a0ee60e6103f7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-23 05:03:49</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1d191567d7212100204a0ee60e6103f7"/> </record_update>
